effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 966,768 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 481,096.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Visage of the Ascended Prophet

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: When you enter combat, gain 1 Dormant Gemstone per socketed gem.

Whenever you heal an ally, bestow upon them 1 Empowered Gemstone to increase the potency of one of their socketed gems by 141 for 20 sec. When their gemstone becomes dormant, it is returned to you.

Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply Insurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each Insurance! active on allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 6,246 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 1,863 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 9,866 for 15 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Codex of Imminent Ruin

spells.description: Use: Teleports the caster to the Argent Tournament Grounds. (30 Min Cooldown)
